description: Microsoft has revealed that .NET 6 will soon reach the end of its official support. The free open-source developer platform will no longer be supported by the company on November 12, 2024. Read more...
title: Microsoft reveals .NET 6 will no longer be supported on November 12

description: Netflix announced its financial results for the second quarter of 2024. The company revealed it added over 8 million new subscribers worldwide for its streaming service, blowing away expectations. Read more...
title: Netflix blows away expectations again with over 8 million new subscribers for Q2 2024

description: Ubisoft's financial report for the first quarter of 2024 has the French company finishing ahead of expectations. This is mostly thanks to its suite of classic and recent "Games as a Service" titles. Read more...
title: Ubisoft touts "solid start to the year" in financial results thanks to live service games

description: As the launch date for the Pixel 9 series comes near, Google released a new teaser video featuring the Pixel 9 Pro. The video shows the Pixel 9 Pro from its rear side confirming some previous rumors. Read more...
title: Google releases new teaser for the Pixel 9 Pro, showcasing its back side

description: Despite being cheaper, GPT-4o mini outperforms other small models in various benchmarks, including text and vision reasoning, mathematical reasoning, coding tasks, and multimodal reasoning. Read more...
title: OpenAI's GPT-4o mini surpasses Gemini 1.5 Flash and Claude Haiku in most benchmarks

description: All Microsoft Windows Insider members can download a new update to the Microsoft Store, which adds search suggestions and more. Dev and Canary Insiders are getting a new Paint update as well. Read more...
title: Windows Insiders are getting new Paint and Store updates today

description: Ola Maps is aggressively targeting Indian developers by offering competitive pricing, including 5 million free API calls per month for most developers and significantly reduced prices. Read more...
title: India's Ola Maps takes on Google Maps with aggressive pricing and roadmap

description: Microsoft has released a new version of the Dev Home app, a tool that aims to make life easier for developers with Windows machines. Version 0.16 brings new features, bug fixes, and more. Read more...
title: Microsoft releases Dev Home 0.16 with new features, bug fixes, and more

description: Developer Rare and publisher Microsoft have revealed what will be included in Season 13 of the pirate-themed online game Sea of Thieves, as players will have to take on The Burning Blade ship. Read more...
title: Sea of Thieves Season 13 details revealed as you get to take on The Burning Blade ship

description: The Coalition for Secure AI (CoSAI), a new industry group formed by major tech companies like Microsoft, Google, NVIDIA, IBM and OpenAI, was announced at the Aspen Security Forum. Read more...
title: Microsoft, NVIDIA, Google and others form Coalition for Secure AI (CoSAI)

description: The LG gram Superslim is now at its lowest-ever price of $1,297, down from $1,596.99. It has an Intel Core Ultra 7 CPU, 16GB of RAM, a 512GB SSD, and an OLED display. It's also very thin. Read more...
title: The LG gram Superslim has hit an all-time low price of $1,297

description: Block's Cash App is pulling out of the UK market to focus its efforts on the US. The company said it had not made the decision lightly as it knew the impacts it would have, but it decided to continue. Read more...
title: Cash App leaving the UK on September 15 to focus on the US

description: In response to the industry's trend of releasing cost-effective AI models, OpenAI announced GPT-4o mini. This new model is cheaper and faster than its predecessors, replacing GPT-3.5 Turbo. Read more...
title: OpenAI launches GPT-4o Mini: a more affordable AI model for developers

description: Zero-logging, advanced encryption algorithm, fast technology updates and more — this is your ultimate solution for safe internet without restrictions with today's highlighted deal. Read more...
title: 5 years of AdGuard VPN now 90% off

description: Commercial and education Microsoft 365 subscribers can now use the Copilot generative AI assistant to help them create quizzes for Microsoft Forms, including math quizzes and more. Read more...
title: Commercial Microsoft 365 subscribers can now use Copilot to make quizzes in Forms

description: If you have not spent enough money on the recent Steam Summer Sale, the Epic Games Store is giving you another chance to buy some discounted PC games. The Epic Games Store Summer Sale is now live. Read more...
title: Epic Games Store Summer Sale is live with discounts on hundreds of PC games

description: Microsoft's latest Free Play Days promotion for Xbox players is touting access to PGA Tour 2K23, Park Beyond and Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora. The Ubisoft title is free for all Xbox players to try. Read more...
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora, PGA Tour 2K23, and more join Xbox Free Play Days this weekend

description: The Dell Inspiron 16 Plus 7640 now costs £989.99 after a 21% discount. It includes an Intel Core Ultra 7-155H CPU, 16GB RAM, a 1TB SSD, and an Nvidia GeForce RTX 4060 graphics card. Read more...
title: The Dell Inspiron 16 Plus 7640 is reduced by 21% now to £989.99

description: Google was spotted working on a new customization feature that is currently under development, which will help you to switch from Google's default font to the system font when using the Gboard. Read more...
title: Gboard may soon let you switch to a different keyboard font

description: Italy's competition watchdog AGCM has started a new investigation against Google. The Authority accuses Google of misleading users to collect data and using unfair commercial practices. Read more...
title: Italy's competition watchdog investigates Google over misleading consent requests

description: The Epic Games Store is back with another double giveaway for PC gamers. This time, you can grab copies of the business sim Arcade Paradise and the survival horror entry Maid of Sker. Read more...
title: Arcade Paradise and Maid of Sker are free to claim on the Epic Games Store for a week

description: Xiaomi is all set to debut its first flip phone, the Mix Flip. This is Xiaomi's answer to the recently launched Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6. The phone has a stunning design and a bigger battery. Read more...
title: Xiaomi's answer to Samsung Galaxy Z Flip6 looks great and packs bigger battery

description: 1047 Games has officially unveiled Splitgate 2, the sequel to the free-to-play arena shooter with portals that blew up in popularity in 2021. The Unreal Engine 5-powered entry will launch in 2025. Read more...
title: Splitgate 2 announced, the portal-based arena shooter will launch in 2025

description: The Nvidia GeForce NOW cloud gaming service is cutting prices for Priority and Ultimate memberships by 50 percent from now until August 18. It has also added nine new games to the service this week. Read more...
title: Nvidia GeForce NOW subscriptions are 50 percent off until Aug. 18; 9 new games added

description: It seems like Samsung is the next to introduce satellite communication to its Galaxy devices because multiple Samsung apps have shown early signs of preparation for satellite communication. Read more...
title: Multiple Samsung apps show early signs of preparing for satellite communication

description: If you own one of Microsoft's eighth-generation Surface Pro tablets, you may want to check out Windows Update. There, you will find a big new firmware update with multiple fixes and improvements. Read more...
title: Surface Pro 8 gets big firmware update with multiple improvements and fixes

description: The 50-inch Hisense U6HF Series TV with QLED display tech, the company's own ULED tech, support for Dolby Vision, and Amazon's Fire TV operating system just hit a new low price of just $279.99. Read more...
title: Get this Hisense 50-inch QLED Fire TV for its lowest price ever at Amazon

description: Major tech companies like Apple, Nvidia, and Salesforce found themselves in a controversy over AI models trained using YouTube subtitles. Apple responded to the matter and addressed the allegations. Read more...
title: Apple responds to allegations of its AI trained by using YouTube subtitles

description: Windows 11 version 23H2, released almost a year ago, is finally broadly available to all users with supported devices. Microsoft announced the broad availability in the official documents. Read more...
title: Windows 11 version 23H2 is finally available for everyone

description: Aside from the Denon AVR deals we covered earlier today, you can also consider the Sony STR-AN1000 AV Receiver, which is a 7.2 amplifier and supports modern features like Dolby Atmos, and more. Read more...
title: Amazon deal: Sony STR-AN1000 7.2 Dolby Atmos, Vision AVR is back to lowest price again

description: If you want an easy to setup all in one solution for experiencing Dolby Atmos at your home, you can certainly look at these Polk Audio MagniFi Max SR soundbar featuring 10-inch wireless subwoofers. Read more...
title: Amazon Deal: Polk Audio 7.1.2 Dolby Atmos, Vision soundbars with wireless subwoofers

description: A fresh report suggests that Samsung's President TM Roh has instructed its team of engineers to make next year's Galaxy Z Fold7 as thin as the Galaxy S24 Ultra to take on the competition. Read more...
title: Samsung instructed to make the Galaxy Z Fold7 as thin as the Galaxy S24 Ultra

description: Anthropic and Menlo Ventures have ignited the Anthology Fund. It's hoped that this $100 million fund can help startups involved in responsible AI innovation deliver benefits for humanity. Read more...
title: $100 million Anthology Fund launched to unleash groundbreaking AI for humanity

description: Amazon US is currently offering the 1TB Corsair MP600 Core Mini NVMe Solid-state Drive at its new all-time low price with a Prime Exclusive Deal, so upgrade your storage solution with this SSD today! Read more...
title: Prime Day Deal: 1TB Corsair MP600 Core Mini NVMe SSD drops to its new all-time low price

description: Microsoft Edge 128.0.2708.0 is this week's feature update for Insiders in the Dev Channel. The update fixes bugs, improves the shutdown process, resolves minor issues, and adds other changes. Read more...
title: Microsoft releases Edge 128.0.2708.0 with shutdown improvements and more

description: Microsoft, almost exactly a month ago, confirmed an issue with its Photos app wherein it would fail to open. Now, the problem with conflict of policies between Group Policy and CSP policy is resolved. Read more...
title: Microsoft: Windows 11 non-Admin Group policy/ CSP policy conflict affecting Photos now fixed

description: If the fresh report is to be believed, then Apple may scrap launching the iPhone 17 Slim, because it has reportedly delayed its plans of using thin materials due to durability concerns. Read more...
title: Apple's plan of introducing iPhone 17 Slim might have run into a hitch

description: A fresh leak about the Google Pixel Watch 3 pricing and strap colors has surfaced, which suggests that the upcoming Pixel Watch could be more expensive than its predecessor, at least in Europe. Read more...
title: The Google Pixel Watch 3 may get a price bump, at least in Europe

description: Season One of the video game-based TV show Fallout received 17 Emmy Award nominations. They include a nod for Best Drama Series and a nod for actor Walton Goggins for Lead Actor In a Drama Series. Read more...
title: Fallout Season 1 is nominated for 17 Emmy Awards including Outstanding Drama Series

description: Microsoft is rolling out an update today for the Xbox.com games site. Certain supported games on the site now offer an option to be launched and played on the Nvidia GeForce NOW cloud gaming service. Read more...
title: Xbox.com game pages now offer the option of launching games on Nvidia GeForce NOW
